name: Docker Engine
description: Checks Docker daemon health and restarts if not active. Treats missing Docker as healthy to preserve stats.
check_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl is-active docker 2>/dev/null || echo inactive; else echo active; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl restart docker 2>/dev/null || true; fi
verify_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl is-active docker 2>/dev/null && echo active || echo inactive; else echo active; fi
